visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a gauge chart with the following specifications: Chart type: gauge, Chart title: 'Speedometer', Axes and labels styling: Use a dark blue color (#003366) for the title and labels, with a font size of 14px for labels and 16px for the title, Data series: A single series named 'Speed' with a data value of 80, Custom colors: Use a green color (#89A54E) for the plot band, Additional configurations: Set the chart margins to 20 pixels on all sides, add a light gray background (#F0F0F0) to the chart, and include a legend with the position set to 'bottom'.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a gauge chart with a title 'Speedometer'. The chart type is set to 'gauge', and it includes a single data series named 'Speed' with a value of 80. The chart's background is set to a light gray color (#F0F0F0), and margins of 20 pixels are applied on all sides. The title and axis labels are styled with a dark blue color (#003366) and specific font sizes. A plot band is defined to highlight the range from 0 to 60 with a green color (#89A54E). Additionally, a legend is included at the bottom of the chart for better readability and context.
